title: A Story of Faith and Inspiration: Hill Number One (1951) Starring James Dean

sources.title: A Story of Faith and Inspiration: Hill Number One (1951) Starring James Dean
sources.description:
The story of the Crucifixion, set within the context of the Korean War.
Delve into the lives of the American soldiers who fought the Korean War in correlation to the incidents that took place in the lives of Jesus' followers three days before he was crucified.

Original title: Hill Number One: A Story of Faith and Inspiration (1951)
Colorized version https://youtu.be/uW_NMh-ghws

Director: Arthur Pierson
Writer: James D. Roche
Genre: Drama, Religion, War

Main actors:
James Dean (TV debut)
Patrick Peyton
Gordon Oliver
Todd Karns
Roddy McDowall
Charles Smith
Ray Hyke
